description:
Kaori overhears a phone conversation between Ryo and Saeko after which she realises that she has rented her room to a detective whose motive is to arrest Ryo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Kaori! Arrest Warrant for the City Hunter
Saraba Kaori! City Hunter Taiho Shirei
さらば香! シティーハンター逮捕指令
